text.name: n1
text.text: A classic Neapolitan pizza, simple yet flavorful.

text.name: n2
text.text: Flour, Tomatoes (fresh), Cheese (mozzarella), Basil, Olive oil, Salt

text.name: n3
text.text: Mix : Flour, Water, Salt Chop : Tomatoes (fresh) Grate : Cheese (mozzarella) Layer : Dough, Tomatoes (fresh), Cheese (mozzarella), Basil Bake : Pizza Margherita
